notes: Loads room SWF and furniture assets; spawns local avatar if SceneCharacterComponent exists and RoomModel.disableAddChar is false.
Holds registry of all characters in the scene and tracks myChar.

key_methods: init(id,scene,type,sex,clothes), reLocate(x,y,dir), walk(x,y,...), setAction(), setSmiley(), useHandItem()
notes: Core avatar render entity; creates display list, applies clothing, handles movement and status updates.
Scene container used by Character init and for retrieving avatars by id.
Spawns/removes remote avatars based on SmartFox events and user variables.
Holds room state used by SceneProcessDataComponent; disables local avatar creation when set.
Local avatar state used when spawning player character.
Reacts to SmartFox user variable updates (movement, clothes, status).
Registers SFS event handlers for user/room variables and extension responses.
Stub layer class for room SWF assets in st01.1.
